itemLabel: Erich von Götha de la Rosière

wikipedia_page.main: Erich von Götha (born 1924, Wimbledon, London) is the pseudonym of the British illustrator and comic book artist Robin Ray.Robin Ray has worked under the pseudonym Erich von Götha and used another name, Baldur Grimm, as an alter ego. Robin Ray has gained fame with his erotic and, above all, sadomasochist content. He has had solo exhibitions in the Mondo Bizzarro Gallery in Bologna, titled Sweat Tears & Reflections and In "Larmes d'Eros" in Paris on the publication of "The Secret Notebooks of Janice". He is represented by Talisman Fine Art who also distribute prints of his work.
